Instruction: Mix the potatoes and onion in a bowl with eggs, salt, and enough flour to bind the mixture. Use wet hands to shape approximately 1/3 cup of the mixture into flat round or oval patties.
Fry the patties in vegetable oil in a large skillet over medium heat until they are golden brown and crisp on both sides, about 5 to 8 minutes per side.
Line a colander or strainer with paper towels, drain the cooked latkes, and serve hot.
